entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bouctouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:16 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
